res.msg:
Unable to start service prometheus-mysqld-exporter: Job for prometheus-mysqld-exporter.service failed because the control process exited with error code.
See "systemctl status prometheus-mysqld-exporter.service" and "journalctl -xeu prometheus-mysqld-exporter.service" for details.
